text: Thank you, North Carolina. I count it a blessing to be able to say I had the opportunity to run for the United States Senate. Although our campaign fell short this time, I am so grateful to everyone, including Dee, Apryl, Wil, Drew, and so many others all across the state who supported me. Last night, I congratulated Cal Cunningham on his resounding victory, and wished him luck in the general election. Now that the primary is over, Democrats must unite to flip this seat blue. I still believe everyone deserves a fair shot to make it in America, and I’m going to continue the fight to make that a reality. God bless!
Vote for your community Vote for your future #VOTE TODAY!
Heading over to Reddit now! #AskMeAnything #TeamFuller #AskTrevor
I am hosting an AMA on Reddit today to answer any questions that you have for me! Starts at 7PM EST #AskMeAnything #TeamFuller #AskTrevor

This is a historic election and a historic time for our nation, where our democracy is under assault and we have to respond to defend our values and way of life! Be sure to cast your vote at your local polling station tomorrow. #Election2020

The Primary Election takes place on March 3. Follow the link to learn more about the #NorthCarolina Primary Election. Then, help spread election awareness information with friends: https://ncsbe.gov/index.html #election2020 #nc #ncpol

I support the Green New Deal as a way to position our communities to be prepared for the effects of climate change, while providing a new sector of clean energy and infrastructure jobs to allow North Carolinians to earn a living and protect their communities in a sustainable way.

Climate change is real. I believe the science. We need to act now to avoid catastrophic outcomes. We need look no further than the devastating and long-lasting effects of Hurricanes Matthew and Florence on the people in Robeson County to know how real climate change is. Eastern North Carolina still is recovering from these hurricanes, which damaged our coastline and devastated rural communities.

According to the Economic Policy Institute, gradually raising the federal minimum wage to $15 by 2024 would lift pay for nearly 40 million workers — 25% of the U.S. workforce. No one should work full-time and not be able to live. #RaiseTheWage
#TeamFuller is on the move all across North Carolina. Great support for our U.S. Senate campaign in Elizabeth City!

The "American Promise" has been that if you work hard and play by the rules, you can succeed, no matter where you’re born. But that has not been the case for far too many families...Let's flip the script! #ncpol #ncsen

In this WCNC Charlotte article, I touch on the current state of economic inequality that exists in NC. Who else agrees that it is time to raise the minimum wage and to address the drastic deterioration of affordable housing in our communities?

Calling All North Carolinians: we need you to promote, volunteer, donate, spread the word and work harder than ever right now! Early voting has begun and the NC primary election is on Mar 3 - we can shock the world and make history but we need your help! #ncsen #ncpol

I led the effort to implement #UniversalPreK in Mecklenburg County. Nearly 2,000 children now are receiving a quality early childhood education who did not previously have access to it. The results have been encouraging. I am fighting to give every child in North Carolina, and everywhere else in the country, access to the same educational opportunity!

I believe healthcare is a right for ALL Americans. As a right, healthcare has to be universally available. Thus, we need a healthcare system that is available to all, no matter your economic condition. This is not the case today. Over 30 million Americans essentially have no healthcare...
Join our team and let's reclaim America! Follow the link to find out what I stand for: www.fullerfornc.com/the-issues

Everybody deserves a fair shot to make it in America: which means having a safe, decent and affordable home, a job that pays a living wage, healthcare available to all as a right, education from birth, and a sustainable planet on which to live. This is why I am running for U.S. Senate! Join our team and let's reclaim America! Follow the link to find out what I stand for: www.fullerfornc.com/the-issues #nc #northcarolina #senate #affordablehousing #livingwage #healthcareforall #debtfreecollege #greennewdeal
I had a wonderful visit with the Catawba County Democratic Women over the weekend.  Thanks for your hospitality and dedication to the Democratic Party.  I can't wait to come back.

My heart aches for the senseless loss of life yesterday because of the shooting at UNC Charlotte. This violence has got to stop. We can no longer just offer thoughts and prayers when these shootings occur. We have a moral duty to take action...now.
Grateful for the chance to address the 1st Congressional District Democratic convention today in Edgecombe County.

Happy Earth Day!  What can we do to protect our planet?  We must admit that Climate Change is real, cut pollution, and take decisive action on clean energy.  We have only one Earth - and we need a sustainable and healthy environment for our future generations to enjoy.
"The environment is where we all meet; where we all have mutual interests; it is the one thing all of us share." Lady Bird Johnson  Happy Earth Day!
Wishing you and your loved ones a blessed Easter celebration.
I was honored to be the guest speaker at the Rowan Dems monthly meeting today. Here I am with Rev. Bob Freeman, oldest Dem in Rowan Co. and  Sparky Guthrie, South Rowan Precinct Vice Chairman.
Always good to see Democrats starting early. That’s why I had so much fun beginning my day with the Forsyth County Senior Democrats. #ReclaimAmerica

It's #EqualPayDay and women still do not earn their full value.  On average, a woman makes just 80 cents to a man's dollar - even less for African American and Latina women. Women have been fighting for equal rights for over 200 years.  Let's get serious about their equality and close the wage gap.  Like if you're with me!

April is #AutismAwarenessMonth, and today is #WorldAutismAwarenessDay.  You can help promote autism awareness, autism acceptance and bring attention to the tens of thousands facing an autism diagnosis each year.  Learn more at http://ow.ly/52Oo50oT5h3

Thanks to my wonderful traveling companions, Brian Harkins, Apryl L. McCoy, & Andrew Fede, for making this day so much fun. We met so many wonderful Democrats who are fired up to make a change in 2020 today.
Our final stop of the day is at the Wake County Democratic Party’s convention.  Wow!  What a crowd.  These Democrats mean business.  Let’s roll up our sleeves and get to work folks.  #2020
It's time for a leader to represent us in the Senate.
Trevor made it to the Nash County Democratic Party's County convention! Lots of great people here - and they are ready to make a change in #2020.

I'm traveling across North Carolina to meet with Democrats today.  I'm meeting and talking with the hard-working Democrats at the Pitt County Democratic Party convention including Paula Stokes Dance, who is the sheriff of Pitt County and the first African American female sheriff in North Carolina.

I join the chorus in calling for #MuellersReport to be made public - immediately.Mueller's investigation has already produced 199 criminal charges, seen five members of Trump’s inner circle plead guilty, and indicted 32 other individuals. The American people deserve to know the truth, the full report should be made public, and this process must be transparent.

Remember those bold pronouncements from U.S. Sen. Thom Tillis about standing up to an abuse of power by President Trump? Never mind. He takes them back. Misspoke. Didn’t mean them. Upon further review, fuggedaboutit.

I am heartbroken by the senseless loss of life in New Zealand yesterday. My prayers are with the Muslim community and people of faith around the world. All houses of worship should be safe places for prayer and fellowship. We must all reject the hatred and Islamophobia that resulted in this horrific massacre. I'm committed to ensuring the protection and safety of our Muslim brothers and sisters here at home.

Under pressure from Donald Trump and the far right-wing of his party, Thom Tillis has failed the people of North Carolina.  Two weeks ago, he pretended to be an independent voice that we need in the US Senate but today he showed his true colors.  He must be defeated in 2020 and that is what I am running to do.

I’m proud of and inspired by all the women who have felt strong enough and empowered enough to tell their truth in these trying times. Women who have felt strong enough to tell their stories to the world about unspeakable abuse and repression, but who have persisted nevertheless, knowing that they will be disbelieved and discounted yet again. I am here today because of such women.  #InternationalWomensDay
I'm saddened to learn of the passing of former Congressman Frank Ballance, Jr.  My heart goes out to his family and his many friends throughout North Carolina.
Congratulations to Antoine Marshall for being honored as a Rising Star by the Wake County Democratic Party.
Great to see NC Supreme Court Chief Justice Cheri Beasley at the Wake Dems Valentine’s reception
My wife, Camille Davidson, gives me the love and strength I need everyday to serve you in elected office. May you enjoy love today and everyday. #HappyValentinesDay.
Congratulations to Justice Cheri Beasley who was named as Chief Justice of the NC Supreme Court today.  She will be the first African-American woman to hold that post.  What a great choice!
It's a sad day for North Carolina.  Thank you Congressman Walter Jones for your years of service.
"But we must all embrace that from agriculture to health care to entrepreneurship, America is made stronger by the presence of immigrants - not walls." Stacey Abrams
After tonight's SOTU, make sure to stay tuned and watch Stacey Abrams rebuttal message.
Great so see my friend Vancine Sturdivant at the #FairElectionsNC09 rally today. I had a wonderful time and the crowd was electrifying
I invite Mr. Colbert to join me at any number of NC BBQ establishments where I will offer ample evidence to the contrary.
Health care should be a right for all Americans. Come join our campaign at http://www.FullerForNorthCarolina.com  and let's make it happen. #ReclaimAmerica
Taking a moment to catch up with NC Senator Don Davis at the NC Democratic Party State Executive Committee meeting today.
Proud to be with so many good Democrats at the #NCDP   State Executive Committee meeting in Charlotte today. These ladies make up the Delta Sigma Theta Caucus.

I laud congressional Democrats for standing up to Donald Trump and his pipe dream of a border wall. A wall is a medieval approach to a modern concern. The government must remain open beyond Feb. 15 in accordance with the wishes of the American people. Let's move on.

I’m truly humbled. I want to thank everyone who joined us this Tuesday as we launched our campaign for U.S. Senate and everyone who has reached out offering their support.  I’m so thankful to have you on my side. -Trevor
"We shall reach higher together. With people this journey is impossible but with God all things are possible." -TF
It's official!  I'm running for U.S. Senate.  Read more at >>
Vilma Leake channeled her inner civil rights leader Fannie Lou Hamer "I’m sick and tired of being sick and tired."
"Trevor has a story and a vision that transcends geography...Now is the time to chose inclusion over exclusion." -- Commissioner Mark Jerrell
Just a few more minutes remain until my special announcement.....

Today we remember and honor a great man who broke down social barriers and taught us the need for justice and equality.   The quest for racial harmony persists, and we must work together to build a culture of love and respect.
